channel.title: Web client
channel.description:
hi, can someone help me whit making a web client. I tried to use this([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html[/url]) tutorial but my client is not working, this is the error: Java Plug-in 1.6.0_12 Using JRE version 1.6.0_12-ea Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM User home directory = C:\---\---
load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://"MYSERVERIP".smfforfree3.com/client/class.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class can someone pls help me.

item.title: Web client
item.dc:creator: @lol156 lol156
item.description:
@lol156 wrote:

hi,
can someone help me whit making a web client.
I tried to use this(http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html) tutorial but my client is not working, this is the error:
Java Plug-in 1.6.0_12
Using JRE version 1.6.0_12-ea Java HotSpot™ Client VM
User home directory = C:------

load: class client.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://“MYSERVERIP”.smfforfree3.com/client/class.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
… 7 more
Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
can someone pls help me.
